q_a.question: Which tag can be used to define an header in HTML?
q_a.correction: The <h1> tag can be used to define a header, while <div> is a container and <span> is inline.

q_a.question: Which is an example of a meta tag in HTML?
q_a.correction: The <meta /> tag is a meta tag, while <div> is a container and <span> is inline.
